body:
@gchanan `numpy.split` is equivalent to `pytorch.split` not to `pytorch.chunk`.
But Numpy can split array of size that is not divisible by the number of chunks with `numpy.array_split`: https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.array_split.html

```
>>> import numpy as np
>>> x = np.arange(12)
>>> np.array_split(x, 5) 
[array([0, 1, 2]),
 array([3, 4, 5]),
 array([6, 7]),
 array([8, 9]),
 array([10, 11])]
```
